summary: HiVim is a color scheme creator
name: HiVim
description:
HiVim is actually a great (in my opinion) G/Vim color scheme creator written in Tcl/Tk/Tix/Bwidget.

HiVim calls GVim so to test your scheme (the fun part) you need GVim installed.

You also need Tcl/Tk/Tix/Bwidget installed...

A screen shot is here:

http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v124/DefEye/Screenshot-17.png

A stand alone executable is here (all libraries included):

http://www.mediafire.com/file/zy5ux4yn0wm/HiVim-executable.tar.gz
install_details:
Run: ./main.tcl

For the stand alone executable:

./main

versions.release_notes:
Traded tk_chooseColor for SelectColor (big improvment!)

I also added more images...
I changed the way HiVim starts GVim...
